message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be of great value to you. I'm thinking of a price of $130 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you starting the conversation.  I'm looking to pay a bit less for the product. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we split the difference and settle at $120?
